channel.title: NEED help with adding crowns to a client!
channel.description: okay i tried changeing the crowns on the client but they are to big because they show only a part of it like i want to add this crown [IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm298/littlepimp/mod.gif[/img] but its tobig and wont show the whole crown how do i edit that?

okay on gimp i did that little box thing with the lines but i dont know how to resize the crown

13x11
